item.title: Anyone play Halo PC or Halo PC Custom?
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

No you dont get it. I MADE maps for custom edition. Custom edition has its own H2 style campaign (downloadable separately, of course). Custom edition has custom maps made. Custom is in no way, shape, or form linked with Halo PC, unless you count both of them being halo linked
